title: "QUANTUM PSI" MAGNETIC ENERGY THROUGH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS / DR. MARCO PARET
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret will demonstrate a powerful non-verbal hypnosis technique for magnetic energy. He used Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze and the subject entered in a deep trance state. The magnetic passes that he did, were felt by the girl and later described as energy going around her body. She also described the feeling as " being calm". Watch the whole video so you can learn all of the non-verbal hypnosis secrets, that Dr. Paret shared. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
